keyMoments.title: Defeats Oars with Gomu Gomu no Gigant Bazooka
keyMoments.description: Luffy uses Gear 3 to inflate both arms and delivers a devastating Gigant Bazooka attack from the top of Thriller Bark's mast, breaking Oars' spine and defeating the giant zombie.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the climactic victory over Oars and demonstrates the full power of Luffy's Gear 3 technique in a coordinated team battle.

abilities.description: Gear 3 version of Gomu Gomu no Bazooka. Luffy inflates both arms by biting both thumbs and delivers a devastating double-palm strike with enormous power.

keyMoments.title: Uses Santoryu Ougi: Sanzen Sekai to Straighten Oars' Spine
keyMoments.description: Zoro uses his ultimate Three Sword Style technique to force his way through Oars' stomach and straighten the giant's S-shaped spine, creating the critical opening for Luffy's finishing attack.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Zoro's crucial tactical role in major battles and his willingness to use his most powerful techniques to support his captain and crew.

abilities.description: Three Sword Style Secret Technique: Three Thousand Worlds. Zoro's ultimate technique where he uses all three swords to deliver a devastating attack.

keyMoments.title: Uses Rain Tempo to Set Up Freezing Attack
keyMoments.description: Nami uses her Clima-Tact to create Rain Tempo, soaking Oars and enabling Franky and Usopp's freezing technique in the coordinated assault.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases Nami's strategic thinking and her ability to support her crewmates through weather manipulation.

keyMoments.title: Operates Freezing Cannon with Franky
keyMoments.description: Usopp helps Franky operate a specialized freezing cannon powered by Coup de Vent, freezing Oars' legs and immobilizing the giant zombie.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Usopp's technical skills and ability to work with Franky on complex machinery.

keyMoments.title: Restrains Oars with Chains
keyMoments.description: Sanji secures chains around Oars' neck using the ship's rudder mechanism, tightening them to further restrict the giant zombie's movement.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Sanji's tactical thinking and physical prowess in the coordinated team battle.

name.japanese: トニートニー・チョッパー

keyMoments.title: Reveals Oars' Anatomical Weakness
keyMoments.description: Using his medical knowledge, Chopper explains that Oars has an S-shaped spine and that straightening it will prevent the giant from absorbing impact, providing the key to defeating him.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Chopper's value as the crew's doctor and shows how his medical expertise can be tactically crucial in battle, not just for healing.
keyMoments.quote: Oars' spine is S-shaped! If we straighten it, he won't be able to absorb the impact!

keyMoments.title: Uses Pierna Fleur to Create Footholds
keyMoments.description: Robin uses Pierna Fleur to sprout multiple legs along the outer wall of Thriller Bark's mast tower, creating footholds that allow Brook to carry Luffy to the top for the final attack.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases Robin's versatile use of her Hana Hana no Mi abilities for tactical support in the coordinated assault.

abilities.description: Robin sprouts multiple legs on chosen objects or surfaces, allowing her to create footholds or lift people several meters higher.

keyMoments.title: Combined Freezing Technique with Usopp
keyMoments.description: Franky fires a Coup de Vent to power up a specialized freezing cannon which he and Usopp use to freeze Oars' legs, immobilizing the giant zombie's lower body.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Franky's engineering prowess and ability to create and operate complex weapons in battle.

keyMoments.title: Carries Luffy to the Mast Top
keyMoments.description: Brook uses his incredible speed and agility to carry Luffy up the tower using the footholds created by Robin's Pierna Fleur, positioning Luffy for the finishing blow.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Brook's integration into the crew and his crucial support role in the coordinated attack. This marks one of Brook's first major tactical contributions to a crew battle.

keyMoments.title: Activates Shadows Asgard
keyMoments.description: Moria reveals and activates his ultimate technique, Shadows Asgard, absorbing all 1,000 shadows from every zombie on Thriller Bark into his own body.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Moria's trump card and demonstrates the terrifying potential of the Kage Kage no Mi when pushed to its limits. This represents a 10x power-up compared to Nightmare Luffy's 100 shadows.
keyMoments.quote: You absorbed 100 shadows to become Nightmare Luffy... but I'm absorbing 1,000 shadows into my own body!

keyMoments.title: Transforms into Grotesque Giant Form
keyMoments.description: After absorbing 1,000 shadows, Moria's body transforms into a massive, grotesque monster rivaling Oars in size, with short spindly legs, gigantic arms, and a huge bloated neck. He demonstrates his power by creating a massive fissure in Thriller Bark with a single punch.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Moria as a devastating final boss for the arc and creates a seemingly impossible challenge for the exhausted Straw Hats.

abilities.description: Moria's ultimate technique where he absorbs all shadows in the vicinity into his own body, dramatically increasing his size and power but causing grotesque physical transformation.

reveals.information: Ultimate technique Shadows Asgard can absorb 1,000 shadows

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Straw Hats' Coordinated Attack
keyMoments.description: Oars is finally defeated when Luffy's Gomu Gomu no Gigant Bazooka shatters his spine after the crew's coordinated assault immobilizes him and straightens his S-shaped spine.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the end of the legendary zombie's reign of terror and demonstrates that even the most powerful enemies can be overcome through teamwork and strategy.

statusHistory.description: Spine shattered by Luffy's Gigant Bazooka

reveals.information: S-shaped spine becomes a critical weakness when straightened
